title: Newly engaged Jessica Mauboy opens up about having babies with fiancé Themeli Magripilis
text:
Jessica Mauboy has just confirmed her engagement to longtime boyfriend Themeli Magripilis.

And already, the singer is looking ahead to the couple's future, opening up about motherhood in an interview with WHO magazine.

The 30-year-old told the publication: 'Having kids and getting married is something I can visualise.'

Future plans: Jessica Mauboy and Themeli Magripilis (pictured) got engaged during a recent holiday in Greece

But she said that until now, her priority has been on the creative process of writing and recording her new album, Hilda.

The Darwin-born pop star said both her and Themeli's family have been dropping hints, asking when they can expect the pitter patter of tiny feet.

But Jessica admitted it may be too soon, saying: 'They’re freaking me out!'

Big news! Announcing her engagement news on Wednesday, Jessica shared a rare photo with Themeli, who she has been with for over 10 years

Confirming her engagement news on Wednesday, Jessica shared a rare photo with Themeli, who she has been with for over 10 years.

She said the pair had gotten engaged during a recent holiday in Greece while visiting Themeli's family.

'The love of my life proposed to me in his family’s home town of Kalymnos, Greece on the beach at sunset,' she announced, alongside an adorable picture of the couple.

What a beauty! Until now, Jessica's priority has been on the creative process of writing and recording her new album, Hilda

As she returned home from the holiday, Jessica was asked about her engagement by paparazzi at Sydney Airport and confessed it was unexpected.

'It is very exciting. It was a big surprise in fact, it was pretty crazy!' she said.

Her huge news comes as Jessica prepares to release her new album to the world on Friday.
description: Jessica Mauboy has just confirmed her engagement to longtime boyfriend Themeli Magripilis.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
